title: Honky-Tonk Heroes and Hillbilly Angels: The Pioneers of Country and Western Music
description: Discover the surprising beginnings and humble origins of the charismatic pioneers who helped shape the country-and-western scene into the influential musical empire it is today.Included among this collection of legends are Hank Williams, Patsy Cline, Loretta Lynn, Johnny Cash, and more unforgettable people who changed the face of music forever!
author: Holly George-Warren
